#summary KeyListener

= Introduction =

KeyListener is available for all [Component]s. 

Javadoc: http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/awt/event/KeyListener.html

= Events =

 * Invoked when a key has been pressed.
{{{ 
void	onComponent_keyPressed(KeyEvent e) {}
}}}

 * Invoked when a key has been released.
{{{ 
void	onComponent_keyReleased(KeyEvent e) () {} 
}}}
          
 * Invoked when a key has been typed.
{{{ 
void	onComponent_keyTyped(KeyEvent e) () {} 
}}}
